org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.discovery

Class AnnounceListenerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.discovery.AnnounceListenerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AnnounceListener

    public class AnnounceListenerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements AnnounceListener
    This class is called when a device announces itself on the network.

    NOTE:This class doesn't implement a real Thread, because it is a AnnounceListener a different thread then the application will call the announce(org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.packet.ZToolAddress16, org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.packet.ZToolAddress64, org.bubblecloud.zigbee.network.packet.ZToolAddress16, int) method.

    Since:
    0.1.0
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnnounceListenerImpl

        public AnnounceListenerImpl(ImportingQueue queue,
                    ZigBeeNetworkManager driver)
        Created the AnnounceListenerImpl object and register itself to the ZigBeeNetworkManager
        as ImportingQueue
        Parameters:
        queue - the ImportingQueue used to add the discovered endpoints
        driver - the ZigBeeNetworkManager to use for subscription

    • Method Detail

      • announce

        public void announce(ZToolAddress16 senderAddress,
            ZToolAddress64 ieeeAddress,
            ZToolAddress16 destinationAddress,
            int capabilitiesBitmask)
        Description copied from interface: AnnounceListener
        Callback invoked when an Annunce message arrives
        Specified by:
        announce in interface AnnounceListener
        Parameters:
        senderAddress - the network address of the node which sent the Annunce message
        ieeeAddress - the 64-bit address of the node that is the subject of the Annunce message
        destinationAddress - the network address assigned to the node that is the subject of the Annunce message
        capabilitiesBitmask - the bitmask identifying the network capibility of the node that is the subject of the Annunce message
